body.name: Oangcc Android 13 Tablet 2023 Newest 10 Inch Tablets with 12GB RAM +128GB ROM +1TB Expanded Octa-Core, 2 in 1 Tablet with Keyboard Mouse 5G Wi-Fi Blue/Tooth GMS Certified GPS - Rose Gold
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 3 mins
features: 【2023 LATEST OCTA-CORE PROCESSOR】Oangcc A15 tablet comes with the latest Android 13 operating system, built-in octa-core CPU, 12GB RAM(6+6 expansion)+128GB ROM mass storage, providing fast app launch and smooth gaming experience. (Expandable up to an additional 1TB, no SIM slot ⚠️)

【LARGE BATTERY, DUAL CAMERAS】Tablet with built-in 6000 mAh battery ensures longer battery life; Dual HD cameras (5MP front + 8MP rear) + Dual speakers to meet all the needs of taking photos, videos, watching movies and so on.

【2-in-1 PORTABLE TABLET】Oangcc Android 13 Tablet has a professional 2-in-1 working mode with Blue/tooth keyboard, wireless mouse and foldable case, which makes it easy to switch between tablet and computer mode. Weighing about 470 grams, it is easy to carry around at any time for long trips and commuting.

【FUNCTION 5G/2.4G WI-FI & GPS】10.1 inch tablet supports 5G/2.4G high-speed Wi-Fi, 5G band speed is faster and improves the stability of the network connection; In addition, it is equipped with GPS function, which can obtain location information through GPS and Google Maps, providing accurate positioning services anytime and anywhere. PS: If you want to use GPS without network connection, please download the offline map in advance.

【PACKAGING & SERVICE】A15 Tablet 丨Folding Case 丨Blue/tooth Keyboard 丨Wireless Mouse 丨Type C to USB Adapter 丨Type C Cable 丨U.S. Standard Charger. Oangcc provides 1+1 warranty (Non-Human Damage), when you have any problem with this tablet, please feel free to contact us, our after-sales team is available 7/24 hours to serve you.
body.description: Oangcc 2023 Newest A15 Tablet 10.1 inch, Android 13 OS, 12GB RAM(6+6 Expand) + 128GB ROM, 1TB Expanded Micoro SD Card memory(Not including SD card), GMS Certified, 1280x800 HD IPS Display Tablets with Keyboard & Mouse & Case Specification: OS: Android 13 CPU: Octa-Core, 2.0GHZ RAM: 12GB(6+6 expansion) ROM: 128GB Storage External Storage：Support up to 1TB Micro SD Card Connection: 2.4G/5G Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n), Blue/tooth, Hotspot, FM Resolution: 1280*800 support 1080p video playback Hardware Configuration: Screen Size: 10.1 inch Interfaces: Type C port, Micro SD Card slot, Earphone port, Mic supported Camera: 5MP Front & 8MP Rear Battery: 6000mAh Age Range Description: 2+ years old Package includes: 1. 10.1 inch A15 Tablet with Case 2. Mouse 3.Keyboard 4. Charging Adapter with Type C Cable 5. 3-layer Screen Protector 6. Well-designed Box 7. User Manual After-sales Service: Oangcc has a professional service team to deal with all kinds of problems. If you have any problem please feel free to send us Amazon Message, we will reply within 24 hours and give you satisfactory solutions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage space
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for Christmas for my son. It is able to hold his large games with out bogging down the speed and storage space. Such as forgive, call of duty, roblox. This tablet is amazing for the great price. Great quality. It has a big screen. Came with a keyboard, mouse and case. Being a single mother price and quality ate key. This is so affordable and works great! Easy to set up and maneuver.Phenomenal job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm very very pleased with this tablet and it's the best one I've ever had at this point, and I've had several !The sound volume is way better than the others I've had, it is fast to upload and download, the screen is very bright and clear, the front facing camera works very well too . It's exactly what I wanted for my bed side table and remote use at a job site .If your looking for a new tablet this one is a very very good value IMHO and so far I can't say enough good things about it. While inquiring about registering this tablet I was also extremely impressed by this company as they were very very quick to respond to my questions and registering it was simple.It is a rare thing now days to find a company that is this responsive to questions or concerns and this company was fantastic, there customer service is top notch from my limited experience with them ! They literally got back in touch with me in <24 hours to answer my question on registering this tablet,,how great is that ? Good Job !It's everything I was looking for and more, I for one highly recommended this tablet and company !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, inexpensive tablet -- but the mouse didn't work!
reviews.reviewText: While I really like theis touchscreen tablet and the optional keyboard, I was disappointed that the mouse that came with it does not work. I tried several batteries but it would never turn on. I doubt I use the mouse that frequently, but it would probably be good to have when using the keyboard. A non-working mouse is not worth the effort to return the product -- especially as I really like the tablet. So far it works well -- just no mouse. Perhaps, one of my old mouses will work with it -- or, if necessary, I could always buy another inexpensive one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good value for money
reviews.reviewText: Overall I am impressed with this tablet. It is not quite as fast as my Samsung but it is close and it cost a lot less. One feature that I appreciated was that it came with a utility that allowed me to transfer all my data and settings from my old tablet. I had not seen this before and it saved me a lot of time and effort in setting it up. It also supported 5gb wireless so it is very good with streaming applications. Customer service is knowledgeable and responsive. I highly recommend this tablet as a good value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gave my daughter my old android 11 tablet I am usually very particular about what brand I use, but I'd thought I try something priced lower. When I received and tried this tablet I was pleasantly surprised, it's fast and works well. Love the accessories, the keyboard and mouse connects instantly when Bluetooth is on. The touch screen works great, I added a screen protector for added protection. The case was really stiff at first but loosened up after a few uses I like the color of it.Packaging was great, very well packaged.Been using this tablet for almost 2 months, I watch YouTube videos and play games on it with no issues, no lags no force closings. Nothing bad I can say about it, it just functions great, plus I love that I can add extra storage. For the price and the accessories it’s a great deal, buy it and buy it now, enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrble UI and cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: First off, it all runs on Google, which, as a PC technician I can tell you Chrome is SOLELY designed for big businesses that use server towers, so please stop making it your go-to for home use as it overheats and destroys your electronics by running the CPU hot. Also, be sure to disable the spellcheck in your keyboard options or Chrome will crash every time a word is misspelled and you poke anywhere near it. Trying to type and edit text online is virtually impossible until that is disabled.Secondly, managing photos is almost all locked by subscription fees or glued to cloud saving (where they get copies of your images if you read Google ToS. You give them the right to own and use anything on cloud). Everything i do on my old Samsung phone for free is blocked by subscriptions. Editing, adding cover photos to folders, grouping folders... No organizing anywhere because it just places the folders and not even alphabetically; just wherever it feels. A lot of issues more with the Google Photos it uses, but I am not here to review that crappy app this tablet runs on so I'll move on.Other stuff I hate about this tablet:SD Card is INSANELY difficult to insert or remove. Needed a toothpick I made a flat bar on one side of like a branding iron to push it in. Taking it out I almost broke it.Crappy clock on lock screen you cannot change the style of (Numbers are in a weird 4-digit 2x2 rectangle). Case cracked about 2 days into owning it and I wasn't rough with it. It doesn't leave my bedroom. Also, the foldable stand part of the case does not support the weight as it has no way to clip in place, so the tablet just falls over. Probably how it broke, come to think of it.When I first got the tablet I tried moving my files from my phone to it using the suggested prebuilt-in system. It wouldn't recognize my phone was connected and my phone tried to receive rather than send files.The mouse that comes with this tablet I would expect to protect a Kinder Egg because the plastic is so thin and poorly made. It won't last long.Good luck trying to organize or manage anything on this tablet as it is all a mess of a UI. Has been taking me days to learn how to do simple things like rename folders or disable unwanted features (some of which, like the Read Aloud option cannot be disabled).No biometric lock, by the way. Not a big deal to me but if anyone is curious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fast and glass screen protector comes already on it.
reviews.reviewText: Great product at a great price. Comes with accessories, wireless keyboard and wireless mouse. If you're looking for a great tablet this would be the one to get. It's very fast and has a protective screen already on it with an extra one, as well as a case that protects the screen. I love it.
